aima.core.robotics.impl.datatypes

Class AbstractRangeReading

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.robotics.impl.datatypes.AbstractRangeReading
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMclRangeReading<AbstractRangeReading,Angle>

    public abstract class AbstractRangeReading
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMclRangeReading<AbstractRangeReading,Angle>
    This class implements a single linear reading of a range.
    In addition to the range it stores an Angle by which the heading was rotated for the measurement of the range.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid
